description:
Quick sealing, quick installation, this tire sealant will keep you rolling. With Stan’s No Tubes Tire Sealant, the days of small punctures ending your ride are over. The low viscosity natural latex sealant automatically fills holes up to 6mm, most of the time you won’t even know you got a puncture.

  • Seals punctures up to 6mm
  • Stays liquid in your tires for 2-7 months (regular riding can extend this)
  • Low viscosity, natural latex formula does well in the cold (up to -28° C)
  • Compact bottle is easy to bring along and just the right amount for 1 tire
  • Bottle spout fits perfectly on valve stems
name: Stan's No Tubes Sealant 59ml
